name: Jeffy Game 2
description:
Jeffy Game 2 is a sequel to Jeffy Game, a fan game of SuperMarioLogan, while having Non-SML related content!

-----------

9 months after Effy's arrest, Effy escapes from prison. Jeffy didn't know where his dad (Marvin/Mario) until the news came on, saying that both Lammy & Marvin/Mario was stolen by Effy! It's up to Jeffy, with the help of Scooter (and 2 others) to fight enemies that gets in their way & save both Lammy & Marvin/Mario!

-----------

You can now earn in-game achievements to unlock 3 characters (Scooter, Blue Tomcat & Parappa) & submit your scores to the leaderboards!

-----------

Programming by MeanieSturgill

Art/Animation by MeanieSturgill

Most of the Music (except the music in the credits) by MeanieSturgill

Jeffy, Scooter & Marvin by SML/SuperMarioLogan

Blue Tomcat, The Coco Green Bean Giant, & Effy by MeanieSturgill

Parappa, Lammy, Rammy, Teriyaki Yoko are from Parappa the Rapper/Um Jammer Lammy by NanaOn-Sha
